subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins won the Critérium du Dauphiné in the French Alps for the second year in a row, finishing 1 minute 17 seconds ahead of his Sky teammate Michael Rogers.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins won the Critérium du Dauphiné in the French Alps for the second year in a row, finishing 1 minute 17 seconds ahead of his Sky teammate Michael Rogers.
